Verses: 1 obadhiyaavin Dharisanam; Karththaraagiya Aandavar Edhomaik Kuriththu Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Ezhumbungal, Adharku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanna Ezhumbuvom Vaarungal Endru Arivikka Sthaanaapadhi Jaadhigalidaththil Anuppappadum Seydhiyaik Karththar Sollakkettom.
2 idho, Naan Unnai Jaadhigalil Sirugappanninen; Nee Meththavum Asattaipannappattirukkiraai.

3 kanmalai Vedippugalaagiya Un Uyarndha Sthaanaththile Kudiyirundhu, Ennaith Tharaiyile Vizhaththallugiravan Yaar Endru Un Irudhayaththil Sollugiravane, Un Irudhayaththin Agandhai Unnai Mosampokkugiradhu.
4 nee Kazhugaippola Uyarapponaalum Nee Natchaththirangalukkulle Un Koottaik Kattinaalum, Avvidaththilirundhum Unnai Vizhaththalluvenendru Karththarsollugiraar,

5 nee Evvalavaai Sangarippattupponaai! Thirudaraagilum Raaththiriyil Kollaiyadikkiravargalaagilum Unnidaththil Vandhaal, Thangalukkup Podhumaanamattum Thiruduvaargal Allavo? Dhraatchappazhangalai Arukkiravargal Unnidaththil Vandhaal, Sila Pazhangalai Vittuviduvaargal Allavo?
6 esaavinudaiyavaigal Evvalavaaith Thedippaarkkappattadhu; Avanudaiya Andharangap Pokkishangal Evvalavaai Aaraaindheduththukkollappattadhu.

7 unnodu Udanpadikkai Seydha Ellaa Manusharum Unnai Ellaimattum Thuraththivittaargal; Unnodu Samaadhaanamaayirundha Manushar Unnai Mosampokki Unnai Merkondaargal; Un Appaththai Saappittavargal Unakkuk Keezhe Kannivaiththaargal, Avanukku Unarvillai.
8 annaalil Allavo Naan Edhomilulla Gnaanigalaiyum, Esaavin Parvadhaththilulla Buththimaangalaiyum Azhippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
9 themaane, Esaavin Parvadhaththilulla Manushar Yaavarum Kolaiyinaal Sangarikkappadumpadi Un Paraakkiramasaaligal Kalanguvaargal.
10 nee Un Sagodharanaagiya Yaakkobukku Seydha Kodumaiyinimiththam Vetkam Unnai Moodum; Nee Mutrilum Sangarikkappattuppovaai.

11 nee Edhirththunindra Naalilum, Anniyar Avan Senaiyai Siraipidiththuppona Naalilum, Marudhesaththaar Avan Vaasalgalukkul Pravesiththu Erusaleminperil Seettuppotta Kaalaththil, Neeyum Avargalil Oruvanaippola Irundhaai.

12 un Sagodharan Anniyarvasamaana Naalaagiya Avanudaiya Naalai Nee Piriyaththode Paaraamalum, Yoodhaa Puththirarudaiya Azhivin Naalile Avargal Nimiththam Sandhoshappadaamalum Avargal Nerukkappadugira Naalile Nee Perumaiyaaip Pesaamalum Irukka Vendiyadhaayirundhadhu.

13 en Janaththin Aabaththunaalile Nee Avargal Vaasalgalukkul Pravesiyaamalum, Avargal Aabaththunaalile Avargal Anubavikkira Theengai Nee Piriyaththode Paaraamalum, Avargal Aabaththunaalile Avargal Aasthiyil Kaipodaamalum,
14 avargalil Thappinavargalai Sangarikkumpadi Vazhichchandhigalile Nirkaamalum, Ikkattu Naalil Avargalil Meedhiyaanavargalaik Kaattikkodaamalum Irukka Vendiyadhaayirundhadhu.
15 ellaa Jaadhigalukkum Virodhamaana Naalaagiya Karththarudaiya Naal Sameebamaai Vandhirukkiradhu; Nee Seydhapadiye Unakkum Seyyappadum; Un Seygaiyin Palan Un Thalaiyinmel Thirumbum.
16 neengal En Parisuththa Parvadhaththinmel Madhubaanampanninapadiye Ellaa Jaadhigalum Eppozhudhum Madhubaanampannuvaargal; Avargal Kudiththu Vizhunguvaargal. Iraadhavargalaippol Iruppaargal.
17 aanaalum Seeyon Parvadhaththile Thappiyiruppaar Undu, Avargal Parisuththamaayiruppaargal; Yaakkobin Vamsaththaar Thangaludaiya Sudhandharangalai Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal.

18 yaakkobu Vamsaththaar Akkiniyum, Yoseppu Vamsaththaar Akkinijuvaalaiyumaayiruppaargal; Esaa Vamsaththaaro Vaikkol Thurumbaayiruppaargal; Avargal Ivargalaik Koluththi, Esaavin Vamsaththil Meedhiyiraadhapadi Ivargalaip Patchippaargal; Karththar Idhai Sonnaar.

19 thendhesaththaar Esaavin Malaiyaiyum, Samanaana Dhesaththaar Pelistharin Dhesaththaiyum Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal; Avargal Eppiraayeemin Naattaiyum, Samaariyaavin Naattaiyum Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal; Benyameen Manushar Keeleyaaththaiyum Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal.

20 sarpaadhmattum Kaanaaniyarukkulle Siraippattuppona Isravel Puththiraraagiya Indha Senaiyum, Seppaaraaththil Siraippattuppona Erusalem Nagaraththaarum Thenthisaip Pattanangalai Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal.
21 esaavin Parvadhaththai Nyaayantheerppadharkaaga Ratchagargal Seeyonparvadhaththil Vandheruvaargal; Appozhudhu Raajyam Karththarudaiyadhaai Irukkum.
